admin_role_fallback: ⚠️ Cannot access user roles. Using fallback ID.
admin_only_command: ⛔ Only admin can use this command.
weather_city_not_found: ❌ City not found or API error.
generic_error: ❗ An error occurred. Please try again later.
invalid_date: ❗ Invalid date. Use 'oggi', 'domani', 'dopodomani' or formats '2025-03-22' or '22-03-2025'.
image_loading: ⏳ The model is loading. Try again in a few seconds.
image_limit: ⚠️ Daily image generation limit reached. Try again tomorrow!
help_message:
📖 **Available commands:**
/chatty ➜ Chat with Coffy (supports attachments)
/chatty-wiki ➜ Search Wikipedia
/chatty-meteo ➜ Show weather for a city
/chatty-tts ➜ Generate audio from text
/chatty-image ➜ Generate image from prompt
/chatty-reset ➜ Reset your memory
/chatty-info ➜ Show bot info
/chatty-help ➜ Show this help message
mention_help: Hi {user}! 👋 Use slash commands to get started. Try `/help`!
alive_response_1: I’m alive and full of caffeine ☕⚡
alive_response_2: More alive than ever, ready to generate images and answers!
alive_response_4: As long as there’s power, I’m operational! 🔋🤖
dm_only_command: ⛔ This command can only be used in private messages.
db_missing_dm: ❌ The database chatty.db does not exist.
admin_help_message:
📖 **Admin Dashboard Commands (DM Only)**
/chatty-admin-model ➜ Change active Gemini model
/chatty-admin-models ➜ List all available models
/chatty-admin-context ➜ Set context file for this server
/chatty-admin-context-reset ➜ Reset context for this server
/chatty-admin-contexts ➜ List available context files
/chatty-admin-stats ➜ Show bot statistics
/chatty-admin-activity ➜ Show daily activity (last 7 days)
/chatty-admin-lastlogs ➜ Show last 10 conversations
/chatty-admin-help ➜ Show this help message
no_activity_dm: ⚠️ No activity found in the last 7 days.
embed_stats_desc:
🤖 Model: `{model}`
🧠 Users in memory: `{users}`
💾 Memory file size: `{memsize}`
mention_no_message: ❓ Please include a message after mentioning me.
context_set: ✅ Context file has been set for this server.
context_reset: 🧹 Context file has been reset for this server.
